item.title: Patch Notes
item.description: 22w13oneBlockAtATime Mojang Studios Release New Astonishing Update Saving Minecraft – one block at a time! Simplicitas. That, dear reader, is Latin – the language of excessively edgy proverbs and true commitments, like a cringy tattoo inked during mid-teen emo years. Use it lightly and you’ll end up with terms like “Nincompoop” instead of “Cool dude” on your back. And to answer your question: yes, I am working on removing that tattoo, but it takes a while when all you have is soap and water!
